Flame Radio Button Showcase

The Flame Radio Button is a visually striking custom radio button component that features animated flames when selected. It maintains all the functionality of a standard radio button while adding a playful, animated effect.

<gds-flame-radio name="example" value="fire" label="Fire Element" flameColor="standard" flameIntensity="moderate" ></gds-flame-radio>

Basic States

Default (Unchecked)

Checked

Disabled

Disabled & Checked

Flame Intensity Levels

Subtle

Moderate (Default)

Intense

Flame Color Schemes

Standard (Orange/Red)

Blue

Green

Purple

Rainbow

Sizes

Small

Medium (Default)

Large

Container Shapes

Circle (Default)

Square

Hexagon

Label Positions

Right (Default)

Left

Top

Bottom

Accessibility Options

No Animation

High Contrast

Flames on Hover Only
